system.prerequisites:
Tzeentch Aligned
Psy Rating 4
Thousand Sons Sorcerer
system.sustained:
The Thousand Sons Sorcerer gains the following Benefits whilst power is sustained: Gain +5xPsy Rating to all Willpower Tests, once per turn can make a free Half Action Aim with any force weapon they wield, when targeted by a Psychic Power they can make a -20 Willpower Test as a Reaction and if successful the power fails.
The Character must be Heavily Damaged for this power to activate.
